name: RobotDefence
description:
Inspired by the Japanese mecha anime series Eva and the video game Titanfall 2, I created a mech combat game named Robot Defence. 

This game has a gameplay that combines RPG and tower defense, and the aesthetics of stylized art. In this game, players need to control a robot to prevent mechanical enemies from destroying the castle. Players can use a hammer with four different attacking skills and can fire shells that can cause radial damage. In addition, players can promote their individual attributes, such as damage or health, by collecting the fragments from the defeated enemies. The game was developed with Unreal Engine and launched on itch.io for free.

The game only supports Microsoft Windows system. To install it, the game file has to be downloaded from itch.io and unzipped from the package.
